Params: {2: 'Camu', 3: 'You know it full well. Even the power of Tenebrion is under my control.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'You depend on me to fend against the corruption.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I, am the only one fit for this body.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I did it with my will and fought so from the beginning till now.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's how it was, how it is, and how it will be."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll never be strayed by anything, I'll only follow my own will. I have not lost yet!"}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Words do nothing! Look at you! Only absolute power can protect you from all that stands in your way.'}
